statements: SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT species, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE observer_name='Alice';
SELECT sighting_id, species, location, date_time FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location='Forest' AND species='Deer';
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS num_sightings FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY species ORDER BY num_sightings DESC;
SELECT species, location, date_time FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE observer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT sighting_id, species, date_time FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Forest' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS sighting_count FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY species ORDER BY sighting_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' AND location LIKE '%National Park%';
SELECT DISTINCT species FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Savannah' ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings;
SELECT species, date FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species = 'Elephant' AND region = 'Savannah';
SELECT observer_name, date, time FROM wildlife_sightings ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT location_name, country FROM location_info WHERE region = 'Rainforest';
SELECT sighting_id, location_id, species, date, time, observer_name FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species='Tiger';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT species, COUNT(species) AS total_sightings FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY species ORDER BY total_sightings DESC;
SELECT location_name, country, COUNT(*) AS total_sightings FROM wildlife_sightings JOIN location_info ON wildlife_sightings.location_id = location_info.location_id GROUP BY location_name, country;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM location_info WHERE region='Amazon' AND terrain_type='Rainforest');
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings;
SELECT animal_type, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_id = 1;
SELECT date_time, animal_type FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM adventurers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, gender FROM adventurers WHERE experience_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT animal_type, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Forest' AND date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT adventurer_id, name, age FROM adventurers WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM excursions WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY date_time;
SELECT MAX(distance) AS max_distance, MIN(distance) AS min_distance FROM excursions;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings;
SELECT species_name, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sightings FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY species_name;
SELECT * FROM guides WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT adventurer_id, name, age FROM adventurers WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Jungle' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT species_name, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND date_time <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT adventurer_id, name, age, email FROM adventurers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM guides WHERE specialty = 'Mountain Climbing' ORDER BY name ASC, experience_years DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, region FROM excursion_locations WHERE terrain_type IN ('Mountain', 'Desert') ORDER BY region, location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sightings LIMIT 10;
SELECT species_name, date_time, location FROM Sightings WHERE observer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT region_name, ecosystem FROM Regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name, conservation_status FROM Species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT observer_name, email, phone_number FROM Observers WHERE observer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Sightings ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT species_name, location FROM Sightings WHERE location = 'Forest' AND date_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT observer_name, email FROM Observers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT s.species_name, l.region FROM Species s INNER JOIN Locations l ON s.species_name = l.location_name;
SELECT region_name, ecosystem FROM Regions WHERE climate = 'Tropical';
